meta.title: Company «QPART»
meta.description: We provide metalworking services and manufacture parts and spare parts of any complexity. We perform work according to the customer's drawings or, if necessary, develop design and technical documentation from scratch. Finished products are shipped throughout Ukraine and abroad. We have experience working with foreign companies. ☎ +38 098 995 07 60.
meta.keywords: metalworking, QPART, manufacturing parts, CNC turning work, CNC milling work, heat treatment, metal casting

homePage.description: TURNING AND MILLING WORKS ON CNC MACHINES
homePage.descriptionCompany: We provide metalworking services and manufacture parts and spare parts of any complexity. We perform work according to the customer's drawings or, if necessary, develop design and technical documentation from scratch. Finished products are shipped throughout Ukraine and abroad. We have experience working with foreign companies.

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.title: TURNING PROCESSING
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.descriptionTop: We achieve what others call impossible. A large fleet of CNC machines, modern technologies, and a team of professionals allow us to manufacture parts of any complexity and volume.
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for a partner who can handle large batches, complex shapes, and tight deadlines? You found one.

infoCard.title: We perform any volume of turning work
infoCard.description: We understand that your business can't wait. Thanks to modern capabilities and streamlined logistics, your order will be completed as quickly as possible. Forget about long production times — we work fast and efficiently.

infoCard.title: Quick order completion
infoCard.description: Our fleet includes over 300 modern CNC machines operating nonstop. We process large batches of parts without issues. Want to order thousands of items? No problem. If your suppliers can't handle the load, we're ready to take on your order and complete it on time.

infoCard.title: Precision and production of parts of any complexity
infoCard.description: Our machines can manufacture large parts with a diameter of up to 4000 mm and a length of up to 8000 mm. Need small, intricate parts starting from 10 mm? We’ll do it with maximum precision. Where others give up, we offer solutions and ask: 'When do we start?'

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach to part manufacturing
infoCard.description: With us, you don’t need to look for other contractors to complete the process. We perform the full range of work: from precision manufacturing on CNC to preparing parts for further use. You get a complete solution in one place.

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.callToAction: We are ready to become your reliable partner in turning works!

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.title: Welding
zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.descriptionTop: We provide a wide range of welding services using the most modern equipment and innovative technologies. Our welding work is characterized by high quality and precision, enabling us to handle projects of any complexity.
zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Need welding? We are ready to take on your task, no matter the complexity.

list.description: Semi-automatic welding
Argon welding
Laser welding
Arc welding
Spot welding

infoCard.title: High precision and quality
infoCard.description: Our technologies ensure strong and reliable welds, even for complex metals and structures

infoCard.title: Fast order execution
infoCard.description: Thanks to an experienced team and high-tech equipment, we complete orders quickly and with great precision

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We provide a full cycle of welding services so that you receive a finished part without needing to contact other contractors

zvaryuvannyaMetaluPage.callToAction: Submit your application now and see what we can do!

porizkaNaVerstati.title: BANDSAW CUTTING
porizkaNaVerstati.descriptionTop: We offer high-quality metal cutting using CNC bandsaws, allowing us to process blanks with great precision and speed. Thanks to our modern equipment fleet, we can handle large volumes of work of any complexity.
porizkaNaVerstati.descriptionBottom: Looking for a reliable partner for metal cutting? We are ready to fulfill orders of any complexity with high precision and speed.

infoCard.title: Powerful equipment fleet
infoCard.description: We have more than 10 CNC bandsaws capable of cutting blanks with a diameter from 10 to 550 mm, ensuring flexibility and the ability to work with various types of metal

infoCard.title: Versatility in operation
infoCard.description: We have vertical bandsaws that allow for cutting long sheet blanks if necessary, expanding our processing capabilities

infoCard.title: High precision and speed
infoCard.description: We guarantee high cutting precision and fast order execution, saving time and ensuring accurate results

infoCard.title: Comprehensive service
infoCard.description: We offer a full cycle of metal cutting services, allowing you to receive finished parts without needing to contact other contractors

porizkaNaVerstati.callToAction: Submit your application now, and we will complete your order quickly and at the highest level!

lyttyaMetaluPage.title: Casting
lyttyaMetaluPage.descriptionTop: We turn complex tasks into effective solutions! With advanced equipment and modern casting technologies, we produce high-quality castings from various materials, ensuring precision and reliability at every stage of production.
lyttyaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Do you need a partner for large volumes or complex castings? We are ready to execute your most challenging projects.

list.description: Casting on automated lines for mass production
Centrifugal casting for creating parts with high strength
Casting in molds for precise and durable castings
HTS casting for high-temperature alloys
Casting of non-ferrous metals under low pressure for a smooth surface
Casting of non-ferrous metals in molds for precise parts

infoCard.title: High precision and reliability
infoCard.description: Our technologies and experience allow us to achieve maximum precision in the casting process, making our products reliable and durable.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of casting services, from technology development to finished products, allowing you not to deal with other contractors.

infoCard.title: We turn complex tasks into effective solutions!
infoCard.description: With advanced equipment and modern casting technologies, we produce high-quality castings from various materials, ensuring precision and reliability at every stage of production.

lyttyaMetaluPage.callToAction: Order casting with us today and receive high-quality castings that meet all your requirements!

frezerniRoboty.title: CNC Milling
frezerniRoboty.descriptionTop: We turn complex tasks into ready solutions. With a wide range of CNC milling centers, modern technologies, and a professional team, we process parts of any complexity and large volumes.
frezerniRoboty.descriptionBottom: Need a reliable partner for large series, complex shapes, or heavy parts? We are ready for the challenge.

list.description: Vertical CNC milling machines
Horizontal milling machines with single or interchangeable tables
Portal 5-axis machining center with a working area of 2000x4000 mm for large and complex parts

infoCard.title: Parts of any complexity and precision
infoCard.description: Our technologies allow us to process complex 3D-shaped surfaces and ensure high precision even for the smallest elements. Where others give up, we say: 'When do we start?'

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We offer a full cycle of milling services, so you get the finished part without the need to contact other contractors. Your task is our responsibility.

infoCard.title: Fast order fulfillment
infoCard.description: Thanks to modern capabilities and streamlined logistics, your order will be completed in the shortest possible time. Forget delays – we work quickly and efficiently.

frezerniRoboty.callToActionGeneral: We are ready to become your reliable partner in the field of milling!
frezerniRoboty.callToAction: Submit your request now and see our capabilities!

termichnaObrobkaPage.title: Heat Treatment of Metals
termichnaObrobkaPage.descriptionTop: We offer comprehensive solutions for heat treatment of metals of any complexity. With modern equipment, advanced technologies, and an experienced team, we ensure high quality and precision that meets the highest standards.
termichnaObrobkaPage.descriptionBottom: By choosing us for heat treatment, you not only get high-quality processing, but also a reliable partner who always keeps their promises.

infoCard.title: Our company has a wide range of heat treatment equipment, including

list.description: Standard electric furnaces for hardening and tempering
Powerful gas furnaces for processing parts weighing up to 100 tons
Induction hardening installations for hardening long shafts

infoCard.title: Maximum precision and reliability
infoCard.description: We use only the most modern technologies to ensure optimal conditions for each part. Your products will be processed with high precision and according to the highest quality standards.

infoCard.title: Fast order fulfillment
infoCard.description: Our technologies and organized processes allow us to complete orders in the shortest possible time without compromising quality. We understand the importance of timely execution, so we always adhere to the promised deadlines.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We take care of the entire heat treatment cycle, from initial processing to the finished part, saving you time and resources.

lazernaRizkaPage.title: CNC LASER CUTTING
lazernaRizkaPage.descriptionTop: We specialize in high-precision laser cutting using the latest equipment. Our laser machines with a working field of 2000 mm x 6000 mm allow cutting materials up to 20 mm thick with the highest level of precision and cut cleanliness.
lazernaRizkaPage.descriptionBottom: Laser cutting of metal of any complexity – we are ready to fulfill your order!

list.description: High precision and cut cleanliness
Cutting of metals up to 20 mm
Ability to process large sizes

infoCard.title: Precision and reliability
infoCard.description: We guarantee cutting accuracy and neatness, allowing for perfect results even for complex geometries.

infoCard.title: Fast order fulfillment
infoCard.description: Thanks to process automation, we will complete your order in optimal time without compromising quality.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of laser cutting services, allowing you to receive finished parts without the need for additional processing.

lazernaRizkaPage.callToAction: Submit your application right now and see our capabilities!

shlifovkaMetaluPage.title: Metal Grinding
shlifovkaMetaluPage.descriptionTop: We turn complex tasks into ready solutions. Thanks to our modern fleet of grinding machines, advanced technologies, and experienced team, we guarantee precise and high-quality surface processing for parts of any complexity.
shlifovkaMetaluPage.descriptionBottom: Looking for specialists who understand your needs? We are ready to become your partner and fulfill even the most complex orders.

infoCard.title: Our fleet includes a wide range of grinding machines

list.description: Centerless grinding machines
Cylindrical grinding machines, including CNC models
Surface grinding machines
Internal and deep internal grinding equipment
Thread grinding machines

infoCard.title: High precision and quality
infoCard.description: Our technologies allow us to achieve perfect surface cleanliness and provide maximum precision even for the smallest parts and complex shapes.

infoCard.title: Fast order fulfillment
infoCard.description: Thanks to our streamlined logistics and powerful equipment, we fulfill orders in the shortest time possible without compromising quality.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We provide a full cycle of grinding operations, so you can receive finished products without the need to involve other contractors.

shlifovkaMetaluPage.callToAction: Submit your application right now – we’ll help bring your ideas to life!

piskostruminniRoboty.title: Sandblasting
piskostruminniRoboty.descriptionTop: We offer a wide range of material cleaning services using modern technologies and equipment that ensure high efficiency and quality. Our fleet of equipment allows us to clean various types of materials, providing a perfect result for any task.
piskostruminniRoboty.descriptionBottom: Looking for a reliable partner to clean parts from dirt and corrosion? We are ready for any challenge.

list.description: Sandblasting for removing corrosion, dirt, and paint from metal and other surfaces
Shot blasting for processing metal parts that require intensive treatment
Laser cleaning for delicate and precise removal of dirt without damaging the surface

infoCard.title: High precision and efficiency
infoCard.description: Thanks to the latest technologies and air preparation systems, we provide maximum efficiency and precision in cleaning for all materials.

infoCard.title: Fast order fulfillment
infoCard.description: With streamlined logistics and powerful equipment, we complete orders in the shortest possible time without compromising quality.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach
infoCard.description: We offer a full range of cleaning services, allowing you to receive finished parts without the need to contact other contractors.

piskostruminniRoboty.callToAction: Order sandblasting services with us today and experience our capabilities!

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.title: Manufacturing of Railway Infrastructure Components
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.descriptionTop: QPart specializes in the production of high-quality components for railway infrastructure. We ensure the manufacturing of various components that meet all modern safety and operational reliability standards.
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.descriptionBottom: Our solutions are suitable for both the modernization of existing systems and the construction of new railway facilities.

listServices.description: Modern equipment. The use of CNC machines guarantees high manufacturing precision.
Quality control. All components undergo verification to comply with international standards.
Flexibility in order execution. We work with both large batches and individual items.
Quick timelines. We ensure prompt production without compromising quality.

listPeculiarities.description: Tension bolts, anchor systems, support parts.
Metal structures for bridges, tunnels, platforms.
Specialized products according to customer drawings;

zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.question: Need railway parts?
zaliznychniZapchastynyPage.answer: We will produce them to your order, taking all requirements into account!

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.title: Production of Spare Parts for Agricultural Machinery
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.descriptionTop: Our company specializes in creating high-quality spare parts for agricultural machinery, considering the needs of farmers and the features of modern farming equipment.
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.descriptionBottom: We offer a wide range of parts suitable for various types of machinery, ensuring its uninterrupted operation even under the toughest conditions. Equip your machinery with high-quality spare parts.

listServices.description: Modern equipment. The use of CNC machines guarantees high manufacturing precision.
Quality control. All parts undergo testing to meet international standards.
Flexibility in order fulfillment. We handle both large batches and individual items.
Fast turnaround times. We ensure quick production without compromising quality.

listPeculiarities.description: Components for forage harvesting equipment: knives, shredders, shafts that ensure uninterrupted operation of livestock machinery.
Parts for loaders and manipulators: hydraulic cylinders, mounts necessary for reliable functioning of auxiliary equipment.
Custom parts: we manufacture bespoke spare parts according to specific customer requests.

zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.question: Looking for spare parts for agricultural machinery?
zapchastynyDlyaSilhosptekhnikyPage.answer: Order from us, and we will manufacture them specifically for your equipment!
